TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit IisTraceWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider
Public NotInheritable Class IisTraceWebEventProvider Inherits WebEventProvider
public ref class IisTraceWebEventProvider sealed : System::Web::Management::WebEventProvider

summary.span: 表示将 ASP.NET 跟踪事件路由到 IIS 7.0 基础结构的事件提供程序。

span.span: Represents an event provider that routes ASP.NET tracing events to the IIS 7.0 infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视使管理员能够管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring enables administrators to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含获取运行状况数据的事件类型和处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the event types that obtain health-status data and the provider types that process this data. 它还包含有助于管理运行状况事件的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help you manage health events. 类是自定义的运行状况事件提供程序，它通过跟踪基础结构来处理 ASP.NET 跟踪事件 [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 。The class is a customized health-event provider that processes ASP.NET tracing events by routing them through the [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] tracing infrastructure. 仅当在 ASP.NET 中启用了跟踪时才会进行此路由。This routing occurs only when tracing is enabled in ASP.NET. 在中引入 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 。 is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). > [!NOTE] > 此类不将 [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 跟踪事件路由到 ASP.NET 页事件。This class does not route [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] trace events into ASP.NET page events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 调用。It is called by ASP.NET. 在中引入 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 。 is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 将事件从提供程序缓冲区移到事件日志中。

span.span: Moves the events from the provider's buffer into the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法时，缓冲区中的所有事件会立即从缓冲区移到事件日志。When this method is called, all the events in the buffer are immediately moved from the buffer to the event log. 无论自上一次写入事件的时间或缓冲区中有多少事件，都将发生这种情况。This occurs regardless of how much time has elapsed since the last event was written or how many events are in the buffer. 上次写入事件的时间将重置为刷新操作的时间。The time of the last written event is reset to the time of the flushing action. 在中引入 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 。 is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 执行与关闭提供程序相关联的任务。

span.span: Performs tasks that are associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法执行使应用程序正常结束的任务。The method performs tasks that enable the application to end normally. 此类任务的一个示例就是关闭资源。An example of such a task is closing resources. 在中引入 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 。 is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).
